original_text: So they had a clever idea. Some men took old bags of food and broken bags of wine that had holes in them. They put these things on their donkeys.
korean_text: 꾀를 내어 사신의 모양을 꾸미되 해어진 전대와 해어지고 찢어져서 기운 가죽 포도주 부대를 나귀에 싣고

sentences.original_text: So they had a clever idea.
Some men took old bags of food
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람들은 오래된 음식 자루를 가져왔습니다.

sentences.original_text: They put these things on their donkeys.
